 Valtron and Galvatron where locked in eternal battle. Suddenly Valtron got 
the uper hand. He raised his sword on high. But in that instant Galvatron 
sliced his sword through Valtron. "We are one once more."Galvatron said in a 
raspy voice. he embraced  Valtron. A dark Light burst from the scene. 
Suddenly Valtrons body in the real world craked and an black purple glow 
shown from inbetween  the cracks. Suddenly he became a egg type figure. One 
diffrence. Claws extended from the dark shell and burrowed deep in the earth. 
About to the mantel layer of the earth's crust. It would hybernate there 
until it was rerady to begin its search for pure perfection.
